intro: Impatiens zhuxiensis, commonly known as the Zhuxi impatiens, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Balsaminaceae and is characterized by its vibrant, showy flowers that come in a variety of colors. The plant typically grows as an annual or perennial herb with opposite, ovate leaves. It prefers moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Its unique floral structure and ornamental value make it a subject of interest in botanical studies and horticulture.
